field.name: summary
field.value: Unable to save classes via ActiveWriter

field.name: description
field.value:
Sometimes ActiveWriter refuses to save class diagram when no validation errors detected. It just raises VS Error Viewer (which is empty). Thereis no way out but only to close ActiveWriter's tab and lose all changes on class diagram.
VS 2008 with ActiveWriter Preview 4.1 for VS 2008 was used.

comment.author: mzywitza
comment.text: Please report in Contrib. ActiveWriter is nto part of AR

comment.author: mzywitza
comment.text: * '''Resolution''' set to ''Invalid''. * '''Status''' changed from ''Work Started'' to ''Resolved''.
